item.title: Slice & Dice
item.description:
About This Game

Slice & Dice is a tactical dice battle roguelike.

Take control of 5 heroes, each with their own unique dice. Fight your way through 20 levels of monsters and try to take on the final boss. If you lose a single fight you have to start over so be careful/lucky!

Gameplay
- 3D dice physics, choose which dice to reroll
- Simple turn-based combat
- Level up a hero or gain an item after each fight
- Randomly-generated encounters
- Ridiculous combos
- Undo actions as much as you like
- Each turn is like a mini-puzzle

Features
- 128 hero classes (+99999?)
- 73 monsters
- 473 items
- Too many modes
- ∞ curses
- Weird modding
- Online leaderboards

Credits
- Created by tann (it took ~7 years)
- Pixel art by a3um
- Music by Ziggurath, Aleksander Zabłocki, Louigi Verona, Cold Sanctum, Ro'sø, Andrew Goodwin
- Trailer by Everdraed

I plan to not participate in any sales/deals/bundles. No AI was used to make this game.

item.title: Alone in the Dark
item.description:
About This Game

Alone in the Dark weaves a chilling tapestry of psychological horror and Southern Gothic charm, reimagining the iconic game that set the benchmark for the genre. We invite you to join us on a journey into madness, where each encounter could be your last. With each step you take closer to unravelling Derceto's mystery, the eyes that watch from the darkness grow hungrier. Every bullet means the difference between survival and an unthinkable end. The next door you unlock could lead to a nightmarish realm offering nothing but slashing claws, grasping tentacles, and frayed sanity. Journey to interbellum Louisiana, where an era of decadence hides a darker tale - of escape from past traumas and an intolerant society, into the waiting grasp of something darker, something that has patiently lurked for impossible eons. This is Alone in the Dark as you've never seen it - a skillfully-woven narrative of Southern Gothic elegance and eldritch madness that pays homage to its legendary origins while taking the next step forward in survival horror storytelling.

A Haunting Tale of Mystery and Madness

Step inside Derceto Manor, an asylum shrouded in intrigue, guarding a terrible secret. Client Emily Hartwood and private investigator Edward Carnby embark on a harrowing quest for answers; Emily to the mystery of her missing uncle, Edward to the toughest case he will ever face, and both to questions they dare not ask themselves. This re-envisioned classic invites you to explore an unforgettable single player adventure rich with suspense, frights, and revelations that will test the limits of your imagination.

Featuring Hollywood Talent

Experience some of the greatest acting survival horror has ever seen through the performances of award-winning actors Jodie Comer (Killing Eve, Free Guy) and David Harbour (Stranger Things, Black Widow) in their first videogame roles. Jodie and David’s immaculately captured likenesses breathe life into Emily Hartwood and Edward Carnby, lending a deeply personal aspect to Alone in the Dark’s story that demands it be played twice to get the full experience.

A Tribute to Horror Pioneers

Rediscover the essence of psychological horror in a game that respectfully nods to its 1992 origin, the game that established the survival horror genre. Alone in the Dark is your gateway to an experience steeped in the atmospheric dread of classic horror, with next-generation storytelling and gameplay. A must-play for fans of twisted tales, nerve-wracking exploration, and desperate combat.

A Story That Challenges Reality

Envisioned by Mikael Hedberg, acclaimed writer behind modern horror classics “SOMA” and “Amnesia”, Alone in the Dark’s intricate web of mystery delves into themes of trauma, faith, evil, and abandonment. Whether you choose to brave the nightmare as Emily or Edward, you will uncover secrets that defy everything you thought about videogame storytelling.



  • Explore Derceto Manor in this reimagination of Alone in the Dark, a love letter to the 90’s cult classic horror game.
  • Return to the roots of psychological horror and experience an atmospheric journey worthy of the game that started the genre.
  • Dive into a world full of sounds that make your skin crawl with a haunting, yet mesmerizing doom jazz soundtrack.
  • Enjoy the thrill of desperate survival in a world where reality starts to crumble, evil lurks in every shadow and ammunition is scarce.
  • Experience this nightmare from either Emily Hartwood’s or Edward Carnby’s perspective and unearth the dark secrets of a gothic mansion.
  • Immerse yourself in a deep psychological story that goes beyond the realms of the imaginable, by Mikael Hedberg, cult horror writer of SOMA and Amnesia.
  • See Emily and Edward brought to live by the Hollywood talent of Jodie Comer (Killing Eve, Free Guy) and David Harbour (Stranger Things, Black Widow), who lend their voices, their appearance, and their formidable acting skills to the protagonists.

item.title: Hangul Shooter
item.description:
About This Game

Learn Hangul with a game.

[STORY]
Oh, no! Something makes the monsters from the Red Spider Dungeon go out and touch the grass! Let’s investigate and stop those monsters!
But why are there robots?

[FEATURES]
- The Less Boring Way
If you don’t like rote memorization of Hangul letters or you remember easily what a thing does in a game, then this game is made for you!
If you just want to relax and play a shooter game, you can choose the Easy difficulty.

- Play the Minigame Too
To reinforce what you learn, relax, or get coins faster, you can try the minigame! Minigame is supposed to be like those classic games to learn Hangul.

- Build Your Own Playstyle!
You can choose the [Pew Pew] class or other classes. Then make a good set of skills to clear a level!

- The Rush Phase!
Do you miss that gaming moment when you must avoid obstacles at a high speed? Well, that’s when the Rush Phase comes in! However, it isn’t that fast because you must also think about the Hangul letters.

- The Boss Phase
Bosses have much more HP. Therefore, it’s perfect to learn Hangul letters slowly but surely! But yeah, sometimes it isn’t that easy, so it’s time to focus!

- 1 Hour Drill!
To finish the game, approximately one hour is needed, so it’s 1 hour drill!
Currently, there are 11 levels and 15 enemy patterns. This is only considering the first location on the map.

[PACKAGES]
Packages are paid features to enhance your gaming experience. It’s PWYW (pay what you want), but in the future, there may be a paid version that includes chosen features.

- TOPIK 1 Vocab
There is a minigame to learn TOPIK I vocabulary (600+ essential words)! It’s also supposed to improve your Hangul reading fluency.

item.title: Super Math Saga
item.description:
About This Game

Super Math Saga is an educational platformer game that combines adventure and math. Work your way through levels dodging enemies, climbing platforms, and solving math questions. There are 40 levels and 8 unique bosses in this math adventure. Super Math Saga is designed to help players improve their math arithmetic in a fun way. As players progress, the math questions will get more challenging. Math questions are based around addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, multiples, prime numbers, and finding even / odd numbers! Can you beat all the levels and make your way to the final boss? Join the saga and find out!

item.title: Master Maker 3D Ultimate
item.description:
About This Game

Clear retro 3D levels or build your own in this 3D action platformer for all ages!



Play as Master Maker, a young builder who possesses a special boomerang hammer capable of collecting items, destroying boxes and defeating enemies from a distance! In this 3D adventure inspired by classics of the ’90s, you can explore and build freely. Adventure mode features 50 colorful levels to inspire your constructions. Just move Master Maker from the starting point to the flag at the end of the stage by jumping across platforms, knocking out enemies and avoiding traps! Then Level Creator lets you build original stages however you like by adding blocks, coins, spikes, cannons, trees, decorations, ramps and much more!



Presented in high-definition 3D style, Master Maker 3D Ultimate is a low-poly action experience that’s fun for the whole family, and replay value is practically limitless since you can use your imagination to keep creating long after the main stages have been cleared. Plus, if you complete Adventure mode, you’ll unlock 350 new levels to enjoy at any time!



Features:

  • Run, jump and use your boomerang hammer to clear retro 3D platforming stages!
  • Master 50 unique levels in Adventure mode.
  • Create new original stages by placing blocks, coins, traps, enemies and more!
  • Unlock hundreds of bonus levels for extended replay value.
  • Enjoy low-poly style inspired by genre classics of the ’90s!

item.title: Froggo's Adventure: Verdant Venture
item.description:
About This Game

A Simple and Bite-sized retro 2D Platformer about a frog on another side-scrolling adventure.

  • Stylized aesthetics heavily inspired by retro games from the early 90s
  • 7 different levels filled to the brim with collectables
  • Slow paced and simple gameplay
  • Eat bugs or Yeet bugs at other bugs to win
  • Frog game

item.title: Decypher
item.description:
About This Game

Decypher offers a thrilling experience of deciphering hidden codes. Alongside the standard rule, the game introduces an array of exciting variants and a wide range of levels to keep you engaged.

Features


  • Code cracking: You are challenged to unravel a series of hidden digits by analyzing clues.

  • Variant rules: Decypher introduces a captivating range of variant rules to keep you engaged.

  • Tons of levels: Dive into numerous predefined levels, each offering its own unique challenge. From beginner-friendly puzzles to mind-boggling tests of logic, Decypher has something for everyone.

  • Note taking: Use built-in coloring and drawing functions to eliminate incorrect options or highlight important clues

  • Error highlight: If the player inputs a wrong answer, the violated rows will be highlighted to provide immediate feedback and aid in identifying the mistake.

  • Every puzzle in Decypher is carefully designed to ensure that it has one and only one unique solution.

With its addictive game modes and a variety of levels, Decypher promises endless hours of code-cracking entertainment. Sharpen your mind, embrace the challenge, and become the ultimate code-breaker in Decypher!

Play now and embark on an exciting journey of decryption mastery. Can you crack the code?

item.title: John's Hell
item.description:
About This Game

Description

Simple and short first person horror. Your task is to find out about your brother's death, but also to survive. Most of the time you have to walk and explore the warehouse but be careful because you never know what's around the corner.

Story

You play as John, who wants to find out something about the death of his brother in a warehouse he bought while he was alive. The deeper you go into it, the more you will learn about your sins.



It's better to play on headphones, because it's a horror.

The game lasts half an hour.

item.title: We Are SUP
item.description:
About This Game

A simple bra-fighting game that only uses addition! Dive into dungeons and defeat monsters in online play!

Strengthen your weapons to defeat monsters in dungeons!

Game Description

"We Are SUP" is a bluff-style board game where supporters defeat monsters in dungeons.
The only way for weak supporters to survive is to defeat monsters in one blow!
Players play buff cards from their dealt hands one by one on the field to accumulate attack power.


Cards can be placed face down on the field when the conditions are met. It's an advantageous situation where only the player knows the value of the cards!


When the total accumulated attack power from everyone surpasses the monster's health, the attack begins!


Declare the highest attack power within the total of the cards played!
Be careful because it explodes if you go over.


Get rewards and dance for joy!

Multiplayer

Supports online multiplayer for up to 6 players!
If you go to the adventurer's guild, unknown players waiting for you and your friends are recruiting parties. Of course, you can also become the leader of the party!
Whether you aim for maximum happiness by joining hands or defeat all the enemies and monopolize the rewards, it's up to you! Cooperation or interference, it's your choice!

Features

- Simple gameplay that only uses addition
- Turn-based buff phase and real-time auction attack phase
- Supports online multiplayer for up to 6 players
- Card deck that changes depending on the number of players
- Many effects that couldn't be implemented in analog games

For Streamer

Honami Software allows the use of games produced by Honami Software for streaming (videos/live streaming) and monetization.

item.title: Firespike
item.description:
About This Game

Firespike is an wave survival game with minimalistic gameplay and rogelite elements.

The grass fields are empty. Suddenly, out of the ground a skeleton digs its way up. More Skeletons follow, till a whole horde comes up. There is no way to run or hide. All you can do is survive as long as possible till death inevitably puts an end to your struggles.

You play a Rifleman and fight in an endless Wave survival. The enemies are skeletons. Your Health bar wont regenerate, so you need to watch out for every hit. The Waves build up progressively, in wave 1 there is 1 unit, in wave 2 there are 2 units, and so on and so forth. So the first few waves gonna be easy, but by wave 10 its starting to get tricky. If your health bar goes to zero, you start by wave 1 again with full health. The Wave that you are currently playing is your score, the higher the wave the higher is you score. The game has a retro look, where you play on a grass field and fight skeletons. If you defeat all enemies the next wave will spawn immediately, there is no time pressure, the next wave will spawn only after you finished the current wave.

Units:
- Skeleton Mage: makes ranged attacks that you need to dodge, moves in random directions. Shoots fireballs.
- Skeleton Warrior: attacks you if you get to close, moves in random directions.
- Skeleton Elite: will chase after you, makes a lot of damage if he is in range and takes a lot of hits to defeat.
- Skeleton Dog: is the fastest unit in the game and also the most annoying. Will chase after you and takes a few hits to defeat. You are forced to run away from the skeleton dogs and try to hit them while you run.

The Keyboard Controls are displayed in the Game Menu.

Features:
- Infinite Waves to play.
- Difficulty gets progressively more difficulty with every wave.
- No Health regeneration.
- Ranged attacks with a bullet.
- Animated Units.
- Supports Mouse and Keyboard.

version 1.0

item.description:
About This Game

An adventure game that can be played with a picture book feel, without text in the game.

How to play:

2. Acquire items.

item.title: Prometheus Unbound
item.description:
About This Game

As an amalgamation of leftover memories from a dead brain and an AI implant, Anala Piers is neither human nor machine. But, is she something more or something less? Suddenly conscious in a world that does not want her and a body that does not belong to her, Anala does the only thing she can think to do: she demands answers.

Prometheus Unbound is a 2D stealth platformer with graceful speed and machine-precision movement. Gameplay includes fast paced parkour movement and jumps, as well as stealth mechanics like sneaking, hiding, and wall sticking. Each stage is timed, allowing players to re-attempt levels for faster times, or even to challenge the clear times the developers set! In addition to main story levels, there are five challenge levels where players can test their platforming and parkouring abilities to the limits. In addition, many levels are open to explore in multiple ways, allowing the player to find hidden collectibles and other areas.

item.title: DOS - Steve Pardo
item.description:
About This Game

Introducing DOS (pronounced “doss”), the album, which composer for games, audio designer, and saxophonist Steve Pardo has also developed into an isometric music-driven platformer game.

DOS, the album, is instrumental and cinematic in nature, rooted in the jazz tradition, and consisting of influences spanning indie rock, electronic music, ambient, and classical musics. It is patient, evolving, melodic, and curious. It consists of seven songs written by game composer Steve Pardo during a season of his and his family’s move from Boston to Nashville, being a season of change and with a spirit of adventure and hope.

DOS, the game, is a single-player, beat-based platformer, with a bit of puzzle solving, adventure game mechanics, and a subtle narrative. You play as a cube with eyes that blink, where every song on the album is presented as a level of the game. It is a story told as an adventure, simple enough for anyone to pick up and play, with just a touch of reactive challenges along the way, letting the music take center-stage.

DOS is the debut project to be released by the indie game development studio The Pardo Brothers, which was co-founded by Steve and Jonathan Pardo. Steve Pardo performs on woodwinds, guitars, keys, synths, and FX, as well as Mike Baggetta on electric guitar and FX, Jon Estes on guitars and bass, and Brian Fitch on drums. Special guests include Liz Estes on violin, and Amy Pardo on flute.

item.title: Cybergrid Runner
item.description:
About This Game

Immerse yourself in a cyberpunk experience with this captivating stealth puzzle game set in a sprawling cyber city. Hack and infiltrate the core of the megacorporation. Help the hacker navigate the intricate 5x5 tile system, all the while remain stealthy and unseen. Be careful, the corporation armada of drones, robots and guards will actively hunt your hacker down.


Embark on this exhilarating journey as you slide through intricately designed tiles, carefully choosing between maintaining a stealthy approach or unleashing your combat prowess in full force. Your ability to adapt to the situation at hand will be the key to your success.


Slide the intricate tile to remain stealthy, or go full combat mode

Procedurally generated level ensure endless replayability

The game's procedurally generated levels guarantee endless replayability, as no two maps will ever be the same. With painstaking attention to detail, every tile and wall has been meticulously crafted and fine-tuned to ensure that each environment you encounter feels distinct and offers a unique gameplay experience.

Collect weapons and implants

As you progress, you'll have the opportunity to collect an array of weapons and cybernetic implants. These powerful enhancements will empower you to overcome formidable challenges and emerge victorious. Unlock a diverse range of these enhancements to truly master the game and unleash their full potential.


Are you ready to step into this world of high-stakes cyber warfare, where your every decision matters? Prepare yourself for an adrenaline-pumping experience that will test your skills, wit, and determination. Hack, evade, and triumph – the fate of this digital realm rests in your hands.

item.title: Joe Dungeon
item.description:
About This Game

Joe Dungeon is a game about managing decisions of risk and reward. The user will have to calculate aspects such as time, distance, enemies, cards, and more when deciding a path. There are objects scattered about the level that can either help or hinder the player. The user will have to make complicated decisions during fights to ration certain cards or not. Due to the high number of varieties in decisions, each run feels fresh and unique.



Joe Dungeon is not all strategy. There are many sections in the game which require the player to avoid spikes, sawblades, fire, turrets, swinging axes, and more. There are also different difficulties in the game if one finds the current difficulty to be unsuitable for their skill level.



Boards are not just meant to be played once. Each board will score the player based off of their time spent and difficulty setting used. If enough points are obtained, they can be used to permanently upgrade Joe and add unique twists to the game.

item.title: CruxFlaw
item.description:
About This Game

Throw, Slash, Dash! Cruxflaw is an arena score attack game in which you have to manage your use of your stun orb to effectively to survive as long as possible. Manage your resources by throwing it to stun enemies, then predict where it will travel to pick it up and refresh your dashes.

Rack up eliminations in quick succession to earn a score multiplier, be sure to keep it going!

Gameplay

  • Carrying your stun orb increases your movement speed to reposition yourself.
  • Throwing your orb allows you to stun enemies, making them vunerable to attack.
  • When you are not carrying your orb, you can dash twice and attack but move much slower.
  • Bounce the orb off enemies, walls or redirect it's movement by slashing it
  • Picking up the orb replenishes your dashes.

Features

  • Diverse arenas to unlock
  • Medals per level based on score
  • A variety of different enemy types and obstacles to mix up gameplay

item.title: Dark Mirror
item.description:
About This Game

story

The game tells the story of a character who is mysteriously trapped in an abandoned mansion. Our character must confront the dark side of his own mind while trying to unravel the secrets deep within the mansion by following the traces of his forgotten past.


Atmosphere and Graphichs

Dark Mirror offers players a surreal experience with its impressive atmosphere and eye-catching graphics. In addition to moments full of fear and tension, it draws players into a deep darkness with striking visual effects and detailed space designs.



Gameplay

The game has a balance that successfully combines the horror and puzzle genres. Players must develop strategic approaches to solve puzzles and evade enemies while exploring dark and harsh environments. The game's fluid and immersive gameplay further connects players to the narrative.

item.title: GEARS STORY
item.description:
About This Game

No Choices, No Branches, No Multiple Endings

All you can do is choose places to visit and progress through a fantasy story that concludes in about an hour.

Earn Your Secret Stash Through Daily Work

You tackle your job as a mechanic through a "Gear Maze Minigame."
Use the secret stash earned from work to unlock helper features for solving complex mazes.

Features

  • Short duration (2-3 hours)
  • Currency and minigame system
  • Achievements
  • Retro pixel art

Story

The setting is the "Defensive Nation Melkid," embroiled in an ongoing war with mysterious monsters known as "Mamono."
Having lost her mother at a young age, Eshina lives her life as a mechanic alongside her imaginary friend, Jeena.
One day, Eshina's chance encounter with the prisoner Teresha leads her into the dark underbelly of the nation...

A short novel that blends a commoner's story of "working and living as a mechanic" with elements of war and science fiction.

item.title: Deep in the Woods
item.description:
About This Game

"Deep in the woods" offers a unique touch-based puzzle experience, resembling a beautiful painting. Players can explore meticulously designed scenes by dragging and sliding on the screen, enhancing visual aesthetics and immersion, making the interactive puzzle elements more enjoyable.

Beautiful scene

The game follows a classical quest for family, unfolding throughout the changing seasons with exquisite scenes for players to discover clues and advance the story.

Distinct seasons

Throughout the game, distinct characters, beasts, monsters, and spirits contribute to the mysterious, beautiful, and dangerous atmosphere of the deep forest.

Enriching puzzles

Filled with various engaging mini-games, the puzzles in the game challenge players' observational skills, so be cautious not to get lost in the enchanting scenes!

Are you ready to enter this deep forest?

item.title: Hues
item.description:
About This Game

Sprites like color blocks so move them there. The faster the better.
Color blocks can be destroyed with the mouse. Use this combination to solve the very fun very interesting levels.
Features
3 characters with unique limitations you control using the arrow keys to move based on physics.
The ball rolls freely.
The hex rolls but not so easily.
The box cannot roll.
The mouse allows you to destroy the blocks that must be removed to solve the puzzles.
The color blocks disintegrate into a nice satisfying dust by either clicking on them or a nice smooth slice motion.
The color blocks and even the characters can be attached by joints that can rotate by motors.
Levels can have springs and buoyancy from the water.
There is a bonus count down to allow speed runners to compete.
Levels are highly replayable.

item.title: LEAD - Rally
item.description:
About This Game

Get ready for an immersive rally experience with LEAD - Rally, where vibrant colors and abstract landscapes set the stage for an adrenaline-pumping rally experience like no other.
With a unique art style, each race becomes a mesmerizing journey through dynamic terrains. Feel the raw power of rally racing as you tackle various stages, with each surface demanding a masterful touch to navigate.
This is not just a race; it's a test of skill and strategy.

Key Features


  • Realistic Physics: The bumps, the turns, and the diverse surfaces were meticulously crafted to challenge your driving prowess. Despite it's looks, LEAD - Rally challenges the players with realistic rally physics, offering an authentic experience that separates the novices from the true champions.
  • Unique Visuals: Immerse yourself in a captivating world where vibrant abstract landscapes come to life. LEAD - Rally's unique visuals blend form and function, offering a visually engaging experience that complements the thrill of realistic physics. Each race is a visually stunning journey, adding an extra layer of excitement to the heart-pounding rally action.
  • Accessible yet Challenging: Jump into the driver's seat with controls that are easy to grasp, but be prepared for a challenging journey ahead. LEAD - Rally strikes the perfect balance between accessibility and depth, making it a game that's easy to pick up but difficult to master.
  • Mastery Rewarded: Become a true rally master by conquering a variety of terrains and stages. The game's achievement system is not just a badge of honor—it's a roadmap showcasing your journey from novice to elite driver.
  • Unlock the Extra Edge: Push your skills to the limit and unlock special features. From cars and liveries to exclusive rally stages, only the most skilled drivers will access the full spectrum of LEAD - Rally's offerings. Get access a plethora of liveries by conquering stages and completing achievements and let your car reflect your triumphs on the track.

Welcome to the heart-pounding world of LEAD - Rally, where every turn is a challenge, and every victory is a triumph of skill. Immerse yourself in visually stunning landscapes, conquer realistic physics, and pave your way from novice to elite driver. The rally awaits—buckle up, master the terrains, and let the journey begin. Are you ready to LEAD?
